properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM EVENT where TO_CHAR(EV_FIN, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as "RNUM", S.* FROM (SELECT * FROM EVENT where TO_CHAR(EV_FIN, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY EV_DATE desc) S) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM EVENT where TO_CHAR(EV_FIN, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as "RNUM", S.* FROM (SELECT * FROM EVENT where TO_CHAR(EV_FIN, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY EV_DATE desc) S) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
